lt.itakademija.exam

Interface Bank


  • public interface Bank
    A very simplified bank abstraction. It provides basic operations to register customers, create accounts for them and make money transfers. Bank uses an instance of CurrencyConverter that provides functionality to convert money from one currency to another.

    Nomenclature used in this task:

    Say you have an account with 100 euros. If you transfer 50 euros to your friend's account then it means that you now have 50 euros left and your friend has 50 euros more. It also means, that your account is a so called debit account (where money flow from) (and 50 euros is a debit amount) and your friends account is a credit account.

    You can use an instance of SequenceGenerator to generate unique identifiers for customers, accounts and operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account createAccount(Customer customer, Currency currency)
      Creates a customer account in a particular currency.
      Customer createCustomer(PersonCode personCode, PersonName personName)
      Creates a customer and stores it internally.
      Money getBalance(Currency currency)
      Returns a total balance (money owned by this bank) in a provided currency.
      Operation transferMoney(Account debitAccount, Account creditAccount, Money debitAmount)
      Creates and executes money transfer operation.

    • Method Detail

      • createCustomer

        Customer createCustomer(PersonCode personCode,
                        PersonName personName)
        Creates a customer and stores it internally. After this method completes successfully, a customer does belong to this bank.

        Every customer is given a unique identifier (E.g. 1, 2, 3...).
        Parameters:
        personCode - person code
        personName - person full name
        Returns:
        a customer
        Throws:
        CustomerCreateException - if attempting to create a customer with a person code for which such customer already exist
        NullPointerException - if method invoked with null values
        See Also:
        Customer.getId()

      • createAccount

        Account createAccount(Customer customer,
                      Currency currency)
        Creates a customer account in a particular currency. Created account is registered with a customer that is passed in as a parameter using Customer.addAccount(Account).

        Every account is given a unique identifier (E.g. 1, 2, 3...).
        Parameters:
        customer - customer for which account will be created
        currency - account currency
        Returns:
        an account
        Throws:
        AccountCreateException - if attempting to create an account for a customer which does not belong to this bank.
        NullPointerException - if method invoked with null values
        See Also:
        Customer.addAccount(Account)

      • transferMoney

        Operation transferMoney(Account debitAccount,
                        Account creditAccount,
                        Money debitAmount)
        Creates and executes money transfer operation.

        After invoking this method, money from debitAccount will be transferred to creditAccount. If debit and credit account currencies differ, then currency conversion will be performed from debit currency to credit currency.

        The returned operation object contains debit and credit accounts, debit amount and a unique identifier (E.g. 1, 2, 3...).

        Example: Transferring 1 EUR to friends USD account, your friend will receive 1 * EUR/USD rate.
        Parameters:
        debitAccount - debit account (money goes from this account)
        creditAccount - credit account (money goes to this account)
        debitAmount - transfer amount
        Returns:
        operation object which encapsulates transfer details

      • getBalance

        Money getBalance(Currency currency)
        Returns a total balance (money owned by this bank) in a provided currency. Note: accounts can have money in different currencies
        Parameters:
        currency - balance currency
        Returns:
        balance
